data.name: Drabidiboo - Early Access Pack
data.detailed_description:
Available Only During Early Access


Support the development of Drabidiboo by purchasing the Early Access Pack.
It includes a unique loot chest with a copy of every Pet in the Core Set (random variant and actions set).

A LEGENDARY BONUS
At the end of the Early Access stage, when the game will be released, you will recieve a super extra rare "Legendary Elite" loot chest.
It contains a mysterious promo Pet, obtainable only during this event.
data.about_the_game:

data.short_description: Available Only During Early AccessA copy of every Pet in the Core Set + a unique promo Pet.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel or AMD Dual-Core CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 760 or AMD Radeon HD 7600
  • Storage: 700 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1070 (or greater)
  • Storage: 700 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Catalina, Big Sur
  • Processor: Dual-Core Intel
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 3D capable GFX card
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Catalina, Big Sur
  • Processor: Quad-Core Intel i7
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GT 755M (or greater) or Radeon Pro 560 (or greater)
  • Storage: 600 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
